cause.description:
We are spreadding Her Holiness' Cause. Peace. Love. Fried Chicken. Oprah
1. The Love of Oprah is universal.
2. She is everywhere.
3. On the day of Judgement you will only be Judged by Her, and the Prophets Gayle and Phil.
cause.mission: Spread the love of oh Holiest Oprah around the world!
cause.name: Support Oprahism
